about_the_game:
The world changed after a challenging energy transition. You work remotely as a programmer on an important project. The stressful job doesn't help your anxiety, and your salary barely covers the rent. Everything changes the day a small packet of seeds is mistakenly delivered to you. 

Grow flowers, berries, and vegetables right in your home. Sell your harvest profitably to the Cooperative, buy cooking devices, and create dishes from your homegrown produce!

Renovate

Decorate your home with interior items however you like, and turn your apartment into a green utopia. You can relax and grow plants for comfort or dedicate your entire apartment to industrial-scale tomato farming.For designing your apartment, you will have dozens of various designer interior items at your disposal.

Farm

Take care of your plants—water, fertilize, transplant, and, of course, harvest them! The game features soil chemistry simulation, and all plants and fruits go through several distinct growth and ripening phases.

Cook

Learn recipes and prepare healthy, organic meals right at home! Sell them at the market for a hefty profit—such food is worth its weight in gold in the world of the future. At your disposal are a stove, oven, mortar, and food processor, allowing you to create over 50 dishes!

Plan

Use your time wisely—in City Garden Harvest, time flows faster when you're working with plants, and there’s never enough time for everything.

Chill

Learn to balance work and life—earn money by coding and unwind by caring for plants. Spend your earnings to expand your home farm!

Vibe

Enjoy the music—we’ve composed 11 beautiful tracks perfectly suited to various farming activities.

short_description: City Garden Harvest is a first-person cozy farm simulator. You live in a city of the future, and your goal is to transform your cozy apartment into a lush, prosperous slice of paradise. Grow a variety of plants, produce eco-friendly products, sell them, renovate your apartment, and expand your farm!
